recommendations: Promote energy-efficient building practices and renewable energy sources to reduce the carbon footprint.
Invest in green infrastructure, such as parks and urban forests, to improve air quality and mitigate the urban heat island effect.
Implement comprehensive waste reduction and recycling programs to minimize waste generation and promote a circular economy.
Develop affordable housing initiatives and policies to address income inequality and housing affordability concerns.
Implement noise mitigation measures, such as traffic calming and noise barriers, to reduce noise pollution and improve quality of life.
